mc.clients package¶

Clients define logic for CRUD operations on specific object types.

Submodules¶

mc.clients.flow_record_client module¶

class mc.clients.flow_record_client.FlowRecordClient(mc_db=None, queue_key=None, use_locks=False)[source]¶

Bases: object

Parameters:
  • mc_db (mc_db) – mc_db.
  • queue_key (str) – key for the flow queue to use.
  • use_locks (bool) – if True, create a lock record when creating. a job_record. This can be used to add a lock reference to parent flows which create nested flows.
claim_flow_records()[source]¶
Returns:a list of flow_records.
Return type:flow_records (dict)

Parameters:flow_kwargs (dict) – a dictionary of flow parameters.
Returns:
a dictionary of metadata that can be passed to
get_flow_record to retrieve a flow.
Return type:flow_meta (dict)
create_flow_record_from_flow_spec(flow_spec=None)[source]¶

Create a flow record from flow spec.

Converts flow_spec to flow via flow_engine.

Parameters:flow_spec (dict) – a flow_spec
Returns:a flow_record.
Return type:flow_record (dict)
get_flow_record(flow_meta=None)[source]¶
Parameters:flow_meta (dict) – dictionary of metadata, as per create_flow_record.
Returns:a flow_record.
Return type:flow_record (dict)
patch_and_release_flow_record(flow_record=None, patches=None)[source]¶

Patches a flow_record and clears its ‘claimed’ value.

Parameters:
  • flow_record (dict) – a partial flow_record dict containing at least the ‘key’ field.
  • patches (dict) – a dict of flow_record kwargs to update.
Returns:

a patched flow dict.
Return type:

flow_record (dict)

mc.clients.job_record_client module¶

class mc.clients.job_record_client.JobRecordClient(mc_db=None, queue_key=None, use_locks=False)[source]¶

Bases: object

Parameters:
  • mc_db (mc_db) – mc_db.
  • queue_key (str) – key for the job queue to use.
  • use_locks (bool) – if True, create a lock record when creating. a job_record. This can be used to add a lock reference to parent flows that create jobs.
claim_job_records(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶
Returns:a list of job_records.
Return type:job_records (dict)
create_job_record(*args, job_kwargs=None, **kwargs)[source]¶
Parameters:job_kwargs (dict) – a dictionary of job parameters.
Returns:
a dictionary of metadata that can be passed to
get_job_record to retrieve a job.
Return type:job_meta (dict)
get_job_record(job_meta=None)[source]¶
Parameters:job_meta (dict) – dictionary of metadata, as per create_job_record.
Returns:a job_record.
Return type:job_record (dict)
patch_job_records(keyed_patches=None)[source]¶
Parameters:keyed_patches (dict) – a dict in which keys are job_record keys, and values are dicts of job_record kwargs.
Returns:the patched items
Return type:job_records (dict)
